purpose: To provide a set of reusable skills for enhancing AI agent functionalities within the Autogen Studio ecosystem.
principle: Builds on the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to enable seamless skill integration and execution within AI agents.
reusability: Designed as modular skills that can be plugged into the Autogen Studio framework, allowing for flexible and extensible agent development.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; may have limited documentation and stability issues. Primarily focused on users familiar with Autogen Studio.
name: autogenstudio-skills
description: Repo of skills for autogen studio using model context protocol (mcp)
highlight: A collection of skills for Autogen Studio leveraging the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to enhance AI agent capabilities.
